item.title: compile.50
item.description: build number: 50 re-implement command docker pull elonh/opde:sdk docker run -it --rm elonh/opde:sdk zsh # or bash export http_proxy= # [your proxy], do not use localhost or 127.0.0.1 export https_proxy=$http_proxy opde feeds && opde config -a make package/feeds/base/tcpdump/compile -j$(nproc) || make package/feeds/base/tcpdump/compile V=s Compile.txt Applying ./patches/001-remove_pcap_debug.patch using plaintext: patching file configure Applying ./patches/100-tcpdump_mini.patch using plaintext: patching file Makefile.in patching file addrtoname.c patching file print.c patching file print-ether.c patching file print-gre.c patching file print-igmp.
